mibbandwidthAllocProfileTable.name: mibbandwidthAllocProfileTable
mibbandwidthAllocProfileTable.description: A list of mibbandwidthAllocProfile profile entries.

mibbandwidthAllocProfileEntry.name: mibbandwidthAllocProfileEntry
mibbandwidthAllocProfileEntry.description: A mibbandwidthAllocProfile entry containing objects that maps to the parameters of mibbandwidthAllocProfile profile.

mibbandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapersT.name: mibbandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapersTable
mibbandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapersT.description: A list of mibbandwidthAllocProfile__traffic_shapers profile entries.

mibbandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapersE.name: mibbandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapersEntry
mibbandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapersE.description: A mibbandwidthAllocProfile__traffic_shapers entry containing objects that maps to the parameters of mibbandwidthAllocProfile__traffic_shapers profile.

bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Ena.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Enabled
bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Ena.description: TRUE if the shaper is enabled, otherwise FALSE.

bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Bit.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_BitRate
bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Bit.description: What is the sustained rate in Kilobits per second that can be transmitted by the VC(s) when using this shaper. Limited by the framer mode and the interface type.

bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Pea.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_PeakRate
bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Pea.description: What is the peak rate in Kilobits per second that can be transmitted by the VC(s) when using this shaper. Limited by the framer mode and the interface type.

bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Max.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_MaxBurstSize
bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Max.description: What is the maximum burst size in cell that can be transmitted during the peak rate by the VC(s) when using this shaper.

bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Agg.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Aggregate
bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Agg.description: If FALSE each individual VC gets the bit rate that is assigned to this shaper. If TRUE the VCs share the bit rate that is assigned to this shaper equally.

bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Pri.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Priority
bandwidthAllocProfile_TrafficShapers_Pri.description: A number that represent the prioriy of the shaper in respect to other shapers. 0 is the highest priority and 15 is the lowest.

mibbandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfig.name: mibbandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfigEntry
mibbandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfig.description: A mibbandwidthAllocProfile__bandwidth_config entry containing objects that maps to the parameters of mibbandwidthAllocProfile__bandwidth_config profile.

bandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfig_Al.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfig_AllowMaxUpStreamBandwidth
bandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfig_Al.description: Allowed maximum upstream bandwidth of the slot in Kbits/sec. The slot can send upstream traffic up to this limit but there is no guarantee that slot will be able to send this much traffic.

bandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfig_Al.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfig_AllowGuaranteedUpStreamBandwidth
bandwidthAllocProfile_BandwidthConfig_Al.description: Allowed guaranteed upstream bandwidth of the slot in Kbits/sec. The slot can have real-time (guaranteed) traffic bandwidth up to this limit. The total of guaranteed up stream bandwidth from all slots can not be more than the maximum bandwidth of the system.

mibbandwidthAllocProfile_SlotVpiVciRange.name: mibbandwidthAllocProfile_SlotVpiVciRangeEntry
mibbandwidthAllocProfile_SlotVpiVciRange.description: A mibbandwidthAllocProfile__slot_vpi_vci_range entry containing objects that maps to the parameters of mibbandwidthAllocProfile__slot_vpi_vci_range profile.

bandwidthAllocProfile_SlotVpiVciRange.name: bandwidthAllocProfile_SlotVpiVciRange
bandwidthAllocProfile_SlotVpiVciRange.description: The valid range of vpi and vci for the LIM(s). This range is shared by all ports of the LIM. The user should be very careful while changing this value because ALL CONNECTIONS INVOLVING ANY OF THE PORTS OF THIS LIM WILL BE DROPPED BY THE SYSTEM IN ORDER TO MAKE NEW RANGE EFFECTIVE.

mibbandwidthStatsProfileTable.name: mibbandwidthStatsProfileTable
mibbandwidthStatsProfileTable.description: A list of mibbandwidthStatsProfile profile entries.

mibbandwidthStatsProfileEntry.name: mibbandwidthStatsProfileEntry
mibbandwidthStatsProfileEntry.description: A mibbandwidthStatsProfile entry containing objects that maps to the parameters of mibbandwidthStatsProfile profile.

bandwidthStatsProfile_MaxUpstreamBandwid.name: bandwidthStatsProfile_MaxUpstreamBandwidth
bandwidthStatsProfile_MaxUpstreamBandwid.description: Maximum system upstream bandwidth in Kbits/sec.

bandwidthStatsProfile_ActiveUpstreamBand.name: bandwidthStatsProfile_ActiveUpstreamBandwidthOnTrunks
bandwidthStatsProfile_ActiveUpstreamBand.description: Currently available upstream bandwidth on active primary trunks in Kbits/sec. This value is adjusted with number of active primary trunks and their available upstream bandwidth.

bandwidthStatsProfile_StandbyUpstreamBan.name: bandwidthStatsProfile_StandbyUpstreamBandwidthOnTrunks
bandwidthStatsProfile_StandbyUpstreamBan.description: Currently available upstream bandwidth on active standby trunks in Kbits/sec. This value is adjusted with number of active standby trunks and their available upstream bandwidth.
